Tjepkes" author-meta: Benjamin Tjepkes description-meta: "This is the porfolio and professional website of Benjamin Tjepkes." page-navigation: false toc: false sidebar: false format: html: css: index.css comments: false listing: - id: site-listings-1 contents: - title: About Me subtitle: "and my professional pathway" path: "about/index.qmd" - title: Curriculum Vitae subtitle: "of my professional experience" path: "curriculum-vitae/index.qmd" - title: My Blog Posts subtitle: "and other organized ramblings" path: "posts/index.qmd" - title: My Gallery subtitle: "of maps, talks, and more" path: "gallery/index.qmd" - title: My Research subtitle: "in spatial ecology and GIS" path: "research/index.qmd" - title: Helpful Resources subtitle: "for coding, GIS, and beyond" path: "resources/index.qmd" type: grid image-height: 100px grid-columns: 3 grid-item-align: center fields: - title - subtitle - id: site-listings-2 contents: "posts/*/*.qmd" type: table sort: date desc filter-ui: false sort-ui: false max-description-length: 100 fields: [title, description] max-items: 4 - id: site-listings-3 contents: "gallery/*/*.qmd" type: table sort: date desc filter-ui: false sort-ui: false max-description-length: 100 fields: [title, description] max-items: 4 --- ::: {#intro-section .column-body-outset} # A dedicated wildlife ecologist and geospatial scientist... Hello, my name is Ben Tjepkes and this is my online portfolio showcasing my professional and creative projects. I am a graduate student at the University of Missouri in the Department of Geography where I use a variety of data science and geospatial tools to conduct research in wildlife ecology and biogeography. Please have a look around and thank you for stopping by! ::: ::: {#site-listings-1 .column-body-outset} ::: ::: {.index-map} ::: {.cell .column-screen-inset} ::: ::: ::: {.index-latest-container .column-body-outset} ::: {.index-latest-column } ### Latest Posts ::: {#site-listings-2 .index-latest-posts } ::: ::: ::: {.index-latest-column } ### Latest Projects ::: {#site-listings-3 .index-latest-gallery } ::: ::: :::
